document_data.mainbody:
o-Nose was a goblin leader of history in the Orsraun Mountains.
Around 1258 DR, No-Nose led the Bloodier Teeth goblin band. Joined by all goblin, orc, troll, and kobold tribes in the area, he attacked the village of Urml. However, the villagers won the battle thanks to a mysterious stranger in white armor, later identified as the god Torm, whod been sent by the god Tyr to protect his followers in the village.
